      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h1>Questions 5/5</h1>

<p>For each of the nine pairs of lotteries listed below, please select your preferred lottery:  either option A or option B. Each lottery is 
characterised by the probability of receiving one of two payoffs. <br>
(Probabilities are expressed as percentage chances of receiving this payoff, e.g. 20% = a chance of 2 out of 10 of receiving this payoff).</p>

<br>
<br>

#macro (hlline $name $prob1 $value)
#if ( $test )
    #set( $bg = "#FFFFFF" )
    #set( $test = false )
#else
    #set( $bg = "#D2D2D2" )
    #set( $test = true )
#end 
#set($prob2 = 100 - $prob1)
<tr>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg" width="20%">$prob1 % chance of $ 20 </td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg">and</td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg" width="20%">$prob2 % chance of $ 16 </td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg"></td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg"><h2>A</h2></td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg">
<input type="radio" name="$name" value="0"#if("0"=="$value") checked='checked'#end>
</td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg">
<input type="radio" name="$name" value="1"#if("1"=="$value") checked='checked'#end >
</td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg"><h2>B</h2></td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg"></td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg" width="20%">$prob1 % chance of $ 40 </td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg">and</td>
<td align='center' bgcolor="$bg" width="20%">$prob2 % chance of $ 1 </td>
</tr>
#if ( $error.get($name) )

<font color='#ff0000;'>Please answer this question.</font>
</td></tr>
#end
#end
